COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x134
STRING: Whether I was aware of the fact or not, time simply
kept passing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14a
STRING: When I thought about Lise and Arietta, a whole day
would slip away before I realized it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x184
STRING: [Phorni] “Chris... Are you okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19a
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm...? There's nothing wrong with me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b0
STRING: I was still lying in bed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bc
STRING: Yesterday was... The day Lise came.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c8
STRING: Or rather, Lise was supposed to come yesterday, and I
waited for her in this room, alone.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1de
STRING: Phorni was there, of course, sustaining me with
smalltalk.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f4
STRING: To some extent, this was not an unexpected outcome.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x200
STRING: Perhaps Grave had found out about us and prevented
Lise from leaving the house.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x216
STRING: I didn't even know where she lived, so I had no way to
get in touch with her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22c
STRING: All I could do was wait, and that's how time passed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x238
STRING: The one silver lining, was that I had plenty of time to
think about Arietta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26a
STRING: [Phorni] “In that case, how about getting out of bed and
having some lunch?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x280
STRING: [Chris] “It's time for lunch already?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29e
STRING: [Phorni] “Erm, it's half past two? You were awake in the
morning, as usual, but you've been wallowing this whole
time. Was it so shocking that Lise stood you up?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c8
STRING: [Chris] “...Perhaps...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2de
STRING: Phorni knew, of course, about Lise's planned visit
yesterday.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f4
STRING: She hadn't been so direct yesterday, but seeing me
staying in bed for two days probably made her lose all
patience.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x314
STRING: Or perhaps she was trying to cheer me up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x320
STRING: I hadn't told Phorni about Grave, so that was the most
she could do.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x336
STRING: Nor had I told her about Arietta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35e
STRING: [Phorni] “...Oh, I've had enough.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38c
STRING: There'll be an ensemble tonight, so you'd better pull
yourself together before that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a2
STRING: [Chris] “...Sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d6
STRING: Seeing Phorni behave normally helped calm me a little.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ec
STRING: But right away, I started thinking about Lise and Arietta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f8
STRING: Worrying about Lise's no-show.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x404
STRING: Feeling guilty about Arietta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x412
STRING: They should have been separate issues, but they
merged in my mind and I felt almost sick thinking about
them.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x428
STRING: My feelings for Lise had slowly taken root, and I wasn't
even aware that they had done so.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x43e
STRING: Perhaps the reason they remained deep in my heart,
was because they had been pointed out abruptly by my
teacher.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x454
STRING: But the more I thought about it, the more I couldn't stop
recalling Lise, and the more my heart ached.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x46c
STRING: My feelings for Arietta were still the same.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x478
STRING: Separately, I also realized that I had fallen for Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x48e
STRING: What if Lise didn't think anything of me... But I came to
see that such thoughts were no more than attempts to
run away from my feelings.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4bc
STRING: So what should I do?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c8
STRING: The fact remained that I'd betrayed Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d4
STRING: By that time, it was no more than a matter of feelings,
but this matter had to be resolved.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x524
STRING: Before it started to get dark, I finally got out of bed and
had a late lunch.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x53a
STRING: I probably didn't need dinner after this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x546
STRING: Our vacation started yesterday, so I could eat whenever
I got hungry.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x55c
STRING: If I wasn't hungry, I didn't have to eat.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x568
STRING: After washing up, I went to get Arie's letter from the
mailbox.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5a6
STRING: I removed Arie's letter from its beautiful envelope, as
always.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ea
STRING: Dear Chris. I wonder, is it still raining there as you read
this letter?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x60a
STRING: The weather here is lovely, as usual.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x61e
STRING: It's Natale today, and I wonder, did you go to church
and pray?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x63c
STRING: Up until last year we'd always spent Natale together, so
I'm a bit worried about this year.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x65a
STRING: I know you're not a morning person, Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x66e
STRING: You must have gone in the afternoon, I guess.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x684
STRING: That's about when I went to pray too, and I hope our
thoughts were together as one.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6a2
STRING: This is my last letter for the year.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6b6
STRING: In any case, next year's letter will be there very soon.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6d6
STRING: Recently, I've been thinking a lot about the last time you
came back.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6f4
STRING: I hope that nothing's changed, even though we can't
meet this year.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x708
STRING: I wonder if you've learned and become a better
musician at the school.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x726
STRING: I also want to hear you play the Fortelle, Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x73a
STRING: I want to hear it so much that it makes me cry.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x74e
STRING: Speaking of which, I guess you've picked someone
other than Torta to be your graduation recital partner?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x76c
STRING: It's a little unexpected, but if that's your decision, then I
believe it must be for the best.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x78a
STRING: I am so far away, and who can say what things may
change by the time this letter gets to you...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7a8
STRING: But I know one thing for sure.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7bc
STRING: Chris, do what you think is right.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7d0
STRING: No matter what that may be.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7e6
STRING: I am my own person, as are you.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7fa
STRING: As long as you choose your path carefully, there is
nothing that I will not accept.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x818
STRING: And so, if you are ever at a loss, remember my words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x836
STRING: Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x84a
STRING: Do what you think is right.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x85e
STRING: That is my only, true wish.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x872
STRING: Until next year.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x88e
STRING: Arietta

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8c4
STRING: I was unable to write my response to that letter right
away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8d0
STRING: “Do what you think is right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8dc
STRING: Arie had written those words without knowing what
was on my mind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8f2
STRING: If she had known, would she stop me, I wonder?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8fe
STRING: Or would she say the same thing, with a smile?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x90a
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x93a
STRING: No, I... I didn't even know what was right any more.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x950
STRING: I definitely did not want to abandon Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x95c
STRING: That feeling grew stronger every time I recalled her
singing by herself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x972
STRING: But if asked whether that feeling was completely right, I
had to say I didn't think so.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x98a
STRING: I had no intention of giving up on Arietta, either.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x996
STRING: But in the end, I would need to choose one or the
other.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9ac
STRING: It was nothing but an expectation, but it would
probably become reality.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9c2
STRING: My thoughts were with Lise, and when I played the
Fortelle for her, it sounded like the thoughts of a lover.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9d8
STRING: That fact alone was enough to show that I had fallen for
Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9ee
STRING: And the more I became aware of that fact, the more
space Lise took up in my heart.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa06
STRING: I returned Arie's letter neatly to its envelope and left it
on my desk, without writing a reply.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa1e
STRING: Thinking about Lise had made me feel unsettled.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa34
STRING: I wonder where she was now... What was she doing?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa42
STRING: Grave was an excellent musician, certainly, but he was
also very strict.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa58
STRING: I had become painfully aware of that by the second
lecture.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa64
STRING: Someone who took such great pride in being a Fortelle
player would never allow his daughter to choose a
different path in life.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa7c
STRING: I'm sure that until now, Lise had not been able to
mention her love of singing, and had been forced to
practice the Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa92
STRING: I recalled, with absolutely clarity, something I'd heard
long ago.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xab6
STRING: “I... Is it okay if I sing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xac2
STRING: I'd asked her what she meant, but Lise didn't want to
talk about it, so I hadn't noticed then.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xad8
STRING: Nor had I realized what it meant.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xae6
STRING: But I realized it now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaf2
STRING: That's why I wanted to know where Lise was, and what
she was doing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb20
STRING: [Chris] “...Lise.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb36
STRING: I looked around me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb42
STRING: I was afraid that Phorni would hear the words that had
slipped out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb58
STRING: But Phorni was nowhere to be seen, even though she
usually noticed the delivery of Arie's letters.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb6e
STRING: “Until Phorni appears and speaks to me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb7a
STRING: I made up that meaningless rule and decided to leave
my letter writing until that happened.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb90
STRING: I lay down on my bed again, and waited for time to
pass.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbee
STRING: ...Huh?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc18
STRING: Someone was knocking at the door.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc24
STRING: Who would come at this time... Or rather, on this day?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc30
STRING: I could only think of Torta... But I also hoped that it
might be Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc46
STRING: I was still dressed from going out to retrieve the letter,
so I went to the door and opened it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc6c
STRING: [Chris] “Hello.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcae
STRING: [Lise] “H-Hello...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xccc
STRING: [Chris] “...Lise.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xce2
STRING: I didn't realize my cheeks had grown warm.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcf8
STRING: Relief... No, it was closer to happiness.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd04
STRING: A more accurate word popped into my head, but I
chased it from my thoughts.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd36
STRING: [Lise] “Um... Sorry about yesterday.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd4c
STRING: [Chris] “Ah... That's okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd7e
STRING: [Lise] “I injured my foot... So I had to rest and recover.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd9e
STRING: [Chris] “Huh? ... Injured?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdb4
STRING: Lise seemed to have a slight limp.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdc0
STRING: I returned to my senses at those words, and held her
hand as I welcomed her into the room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdd6
STRING: [Chris] “Are you okay? ... Did you walk all the way here?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe08
STRING: [Lise] “Y-Yes. But I'm fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe1e
STRING: Then I realized that Lise was wet from the rain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe2a
STRING: How long did it take her to come here, I wonder.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe36
STRING: [Chris] “I'll bring you some towels, wait here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe4c
STRING: I didn't care if the floor got wet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe58
STRING: I made her sit down, and went to get the towels.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe64
STRING: [Chris] “Here, dry your hair with this.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe96
STRING: [Lise] “O-Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeac
STRING: Lise nodded with a look of surprise, as if unused to my
forceful tone.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xec2
STRING: I placed two or three dry towels on the desk, then went
to the kitchen to prepare a warm drink.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xed8
STRING: Lise seemed to be carrying some kind of box, which she
placed on the desk before taking a towel.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf0a
STRING: [Lise] “Th-Thank you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf20
STRING: [Chris] “Don't mention it... Quick, dry your hair.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf36
STRING: I was curious about the box, but my attention returned
to getting the water boiling.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf4c
STRING: While waiting, I returned to Lise's side.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf58
STRING: [Chris] “So, what happened to your foot?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf8a
STRING: [Lise] “Um... It's nothing serious, but...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfb8
STRING: I missed a step on the stairs.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfce
STRING: Lise removed her shoe, and even with her sock on I
could see the swelling.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfe4
STRING: A bandage of some sort was tightly wound around it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xff0
STRING: [Chris] “Is that a bandage...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1022
STRING: [Lise] “Yes... But it's just to keep things in place, it's not
that bad, really.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1042
STRING: [Chris] “But... You didn't have to come all the way here
today...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x107e
STRING: [Lise] “B-But, we promised to meet yesterday... I
thought you might be worried...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x109e
STRING: [Chris] “Well... I did worry... But if you're injured, we
could've waited till you recovered.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10da
STRING: [Lise] “B-But...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x110c
STRING: [Lise] “Starting tomorrow, right up until school starts in
the new year, I'll be busy and won't be able to come
here...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x112c
STRING: [Chris] “I see... Even so, you shouldn't force yourself to...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x115e
STRING: [Lise] “...Thank you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1174
STRING: [Chris] “Anyway, hold on a sec...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x118a
STRING: I returned to the kitchen to prepare a caffe latte.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1196
STRING: I hadn't warmed the milk, but thinking it might be easier
to drink lukewarm, I poured some in.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ac
STRING: More importantly, she needed to get warm.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11b8
STRING: [Chris] “Here you go. Drink this, for a start.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ea
STRING: [Lise] “...Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1200
STRING: I sat down across from her, and waited for her to settle
down.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x120c
STRING: I was probably far more anxious than she was, but I
decided not to say anything until she finished her drink.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1248
STRING: [Lise] “...That was nice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x125e
STRING: Lise looked into my eyes as she placed the cup on the
desk.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1272
STRING: [Lise] “Thank you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1288
STRING: [Chris] “You're welcome.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x129e
STRING: By that time, I was feeling a lot calmer, and had finished
my own cup of coffee.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12b4
STRING: [Chris] “But... Is your foot really okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12d2
STRING: [Lise] “I was able to walk here, so I'd say yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12e8
STRING: [Chris] “If you say so...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x131a
STRING: [Lise] “I'm really sorry about yesterday...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1330
STRING: [Chris] “It's fine, really. But you didn't come here just to
say that, did you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x136c
STRING: [Lise] “That... And one other thing...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1382
STRING: [Chris] “Wh-What is it...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13b4
STRING: [Lise] “It's... A kind of apology, I guess. I bought a
cake... Shall we?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13d4
STRING: [Chris] “Cake?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13f2
STRING: [Lise] “Y-Yes. I just bought it from that store... The one
that everyone says is nice...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1412
STRING: [Chris] “This box?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1444
STRING: [Lise] “Yes, have you eaten?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1472
STRING: Umm... If you're full... There's no need to...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1488
STRING: [Chris] “Actually... I haven't had dinner yet, so the timing
is just right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14c4
STRING: [Lise] “Huh? But it's already past ten...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14da
STRING: [Chris] “It's that late..?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14f8
STRING: [Lise] “...You didn't notice?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x150e
STRING: [Chris] “I was asleep...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1540
STRING: [Lise] “Hehe... So that's why your hair is a bit out of
shape.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1556
STRING: Lise smiled brightly as she spoke.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1562
STRING: Outside of her singing, it was rare to see Lise smile like
that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1578
STRING: Even if she were only making fun of me, I still felt a pure
joy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x158e
STRING: [Chris] “I'll make some tea, then. Lise, you must have
eaten your dinner a lot earlier, I imagine?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15ca
STRING: [Lise] “Y-Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15e0
STRING: [Chris] “Then could you cut the cake while I get the tea
going?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x161c
STRING: [Lise] “Sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1640
STRING: I got a knife and some small plates, which I passed to
Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1662
STRING: [Lise] “I... I think this is right...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1678
STRING: Behind me, Lise was speaking very softly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1684
STRING: I turned around to see what she was doing, and found
her gripping a knife dangerously, about to cut the
hole-shaped cake.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16a4
STRING: [Chris] “...Lise?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16ba
STRING: I was just a little bit worried, but Lise was so absorbed
in her task, she didn't seem to hear me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16e6
STRING: [Lise] “Okay... Here we go...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16fc
STRING: She was a girl, so I decided it was okay to leave the
cake-cutting to her, and I went back to the kitchen.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1712
STRING: And then-

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x173e
STRING: Nearly in tears, Lise presented me with a slice of cake.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x175c
STRING: [Lise] “I... I'm sorry...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1772
STRING: [Chris] “It's okay...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1788
STRING: Her hands must have been really shaking, it looked like
it had been cut with a jigsaw and was practically
squashed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x179e
STRING: [Chris] “Technical difficulties...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17bc
STRING: [Lise] “I-I'm sorry, actually... I'm not used to this sort of
thing...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17d2
STRING: [Chris] “You mean, cutting?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17f0
STRING: [Lise] “Y-Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1806
STRING: [Chris] “Ha-ha, then you should've told me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1824
STRING: [Lise] “B-But...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x183a
STRING: [Chris] “I cook for myself sometimes, so I'm not bad with
cutting things. Don't tell me you've never held a knife
before?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x186c
STRING: [Lise] “...That's right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1882
STRING: I meant that as a joke, but Lise nodded her head in
embarrassment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1898
STRING: [Chris] “I see... Well then, for a first-timer, I think you did
quite well.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18c6
STRING: That wasn't the best or most subtle attempt at flattery,
but Lise's face lit up, as if she couldn't contain her joy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18ee
STRING: [Lise] “R-Really?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1904
STRING: [Chris] “Y-Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x191a
STRING: Come to think of it, she was born with a silver spoon,
right?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1926
STRING: She didn't normally give off that vibe, but this moment
of unguarded joy made her look so much like a
princess, it was hilarious.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1946
STRING: [Chris] “Come on, Lise, you need to eat, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1964
STRING: [Lise] “O-Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x197a
STRING: Still smiling, Lise starting on her own piece of cake.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1990
STRING: One look at her plate showed that her slice was even
more mangled.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19a6
STRING: It had fallen on its side, and almost all the cream was on
the plate.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19bc
STRING: She was scooping it up with her fork, and somehow it
just didn't look delicious.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19d2
STRING: [Chris] “...Is it delicious?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19fe
STRING: [Lise] “Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a14
STRING: [Chris] “Y-Yes, delicious, isn't it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a2a
STRING: Logically, the taste shouldn't change.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a36
STRING: Appearances didn't matter, it was all the same inside
your mouth.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a42
STRING: [Chris] “Yes, it's delicious.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a58
STRING: Thanks to a little mind over matter, the cake actually
tasted good.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a6e
STRING: ... Or perhaps it was because Lise was here, enjoying
herself as I'd never seen her do before.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a84
STRING: That probably made me happy too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a90
STRING: And deep in my heart, I apologized for the infidelity of
such thoughts.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aa6
STRING: To both Lise and Arietta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ab2
STRING: Before Lise's smile clouded over, I managed to restore
my smile.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ac8
STRING: [Chris] “Hold on, you have some cream on you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ade
STRING: It had been there from the start, but I chose not to
mention it until now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b02
STRING: I told her to keep still, and wiped it off with my finger.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b1c
STRING: I thought about what to do with the cream for a
moment, then put it in my mouth.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b48
STRING: I had thought that it'd be embarrassing to bring it to
Lise's lips...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b5e
STRING: But this was pretty embarrassing as well.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b6a
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b88
STRING: [Lise] “N-Nothing...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b9e
STRING: Lise returned to her cake.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1baa
STRING: I felt her eyes on me from time to time, and when she
looked away, I'd look at her face instead.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c0c
STRING: [Lise] “Well, well... Thank you for inviting me over.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c22
STRING: [Chris] “The pleasure was mine, and thank you for the
delicious cake.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c54
STRING: [Lise] “Well then... I'll be...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c6a
STRING: [Chris] “I'll walk you to your house.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c9c
STRING: [Lise] “Oh no, it's a long way...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cb2
STRING: [Chris] “All the more reason I should go with you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ce4
STRING: [Lise] “But...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cfa
STRING: [Chris] “I'm worried about your foot. If I go with you, it'll
set my mind at ease.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d44
STRING: That might have been a little too sly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d50
STRING: It was true that I was worried, but I knew that Lise
couldn't say no if I phrased things that way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d66
STRING: And that was the reason she walked all the way here,
despite her injury.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d7c
STRING: [Chris] “Let's get an umbrella in town, okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d9a
STRING: [Lise] “O-Okay...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1db0
STRING: Lise nodded, looking at the ground.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dd8
STRING: [Lise] “Th-Thank you...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e22
STRING: Lise had arrived at my room after ten.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e2e
STRING: It was still the same day, but it was fairly late.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e44
STRING: [Chris] “How are you for time?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e7e
STRING: [Lise] “Huh? T-Time?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1eac
STRING: I think it should be okay, but...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ec2
STRING: We chose streets with shelter, ones that led to the main
street.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ed8
STRING: [Chris] “You 'think'?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f18
STRING: [Chris] “What's wrong?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f4a
STRING: [Lise] “Well... I didn't tell anyone... I just sneaked out...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f60
STRING: [Chris] “...And that's okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f92
STRING: [Lise] “Y-Yes, as long as no one finds out.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fa8
STRING: [Chris] “That may be so, but...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ff0
STRING: We reached the main street and I bought an umbrella,
but there wasn't a chance to use it just yet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2006
STRING: There weren't many houses with eaves between my
room and here, and probably between the New District
and Lise's house.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x201c
STRING: That's why we wouldn't need the umbrella until we got
to the New District.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2032
STRING: [Chris] “Lise, do you often sneak out like this?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x206e
STRING: [Lise] “Not... not at all, this is my first time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2084
STRING: [Chris] “You'll be scolded if they find out, huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20b6
STRING: [Lise] “Well... But... It'll be fine if they don't.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20d6
STRING: [Chris] “...I'm sorry, if worrying about me made you do
something so risky...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2112
STRING: [Lise] “N-No, it's fine!

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2140
STRING: I wanted to do this.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2156
STRING: [Chris] “O-Okay...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x216c
STRING: Lise sounded unusually forceful.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2178
STRING: Her face turned red.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2184
STRING: That confirmed it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2190
STRING: It wasn't just me, Lise liked me in return as well.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21a6
STRING: Of course, we've performed ensembles together before,
so I knew that she didn't dislike me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21bc
STRING: But Lise was unable to hide her positive emotions.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21d2
STRING: And I was unable to pretend that I didn't notice them.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21de
STRING: Or the fact that it was Lise and not Arietta who was
uppermost in my mind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x224a
STRING: [Lise] “Erm... Here is fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2260
STRING: [Chris] “What do you mean?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2292
STRING: [Lise] “It's so late...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22a8
STRING: [Chris] “That's why I'm here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22da
STRING: [Lise] “But...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22f0
STRING: [Chris] “Let me walk you to your door. I'll be really
worried otherwise.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2310
STRING: Lise actually walked without too much trouble, just
slowly, due to the constraint of the bandage.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2330
STRING: There were times when she almost tripped, and I gave
her my hand many times for support.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2362
STRING: [Lise] “But...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2378
STRING: [Chris] “You don't have to worry about me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2396
STRING: [Lise] “Al-Alright.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23ba
STRING: We started walking again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23c6
STRING: It looked like for the first time since coming to this city,
an umbrella would be of some use.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2430
STRING: [Lise] “H-Here it is.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2446
STRING: Lise looked up at me, as if gauging my reaction.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2452
STRING: I knew somehow what she was trying to get at.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x245e
STRING: You could tell instantly that it was a magnificent house.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x246a
STRING: Around here, a little ways into the New District, all
buildings were large and grand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2480
STRING: Noticeably grander than all of them, however, was Lise's
house.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x248c
STRING: If I thought of it as Grave's house, that made complete
sense.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24a2
STRING: Up until that point, I hadn't thought very much about
the relationship between Lise and Grave.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24b8
STRING: Even as I pretended that I understood, seeing the reality
of it before my eyes filled me with a sense of
dissonance.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24ce
STRING: Then again, I'd probably get used to it soon, and with
that thought I turned to Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2500
STRING: [Lise] “Um... I'm sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2516
STRING: [Chris] “For what?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2534
STRING: [Lise] “You knew about my father, right...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x254a
STRING: [Chris] “Yes, I found out about the same time as I
learned about the Fortelle course.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2586
STRING: [Lise] “I didn't mean to keep it from you... I just....”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x259c
STRING: [Chris] “There's no need to worry about that. Instead, if
you knew about what happened, then...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25d8
STRING: [Lise] “I heard about it from Father...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25ee
STRING: [Chris] “And you...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2620
STRING: [Lise] “But I.... I...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2636
STRING: Lise was trembling, but her voice was firm.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x265e
STRING: [Lise] “I like singing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2674
STRING: [Chris] “...Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26a6
STRING: [Lise] “I... Is it okay if I sing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26bc
STRING: [Chris] “...Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26ee
STRING: [Lise] “...Really?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2704
STRING: [Chris] “Yes, of course. You're free to do so. If you really
want to sing, then I think you should sing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2740
STRING: [Lise] “Chris... Th-Thank you. For everything that will
come, too. As...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2760
STRING: Lise turned bright red, but she spoke clearly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2788
STRING: [Lise] “As partners.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x279e
STRING: [Chris] “Thank you, Lise. I look forward to it as well.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27b8
STRING: I bowed in response to Lise's over-the-top bow.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27c4
STRING: I wasn't able to ask about her plans for the next few
days, but I made her take the umbrella and watched her
go inside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27e4
STRING: My feelings were probably fixed at that time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27f0
STRING: I had to write my letter to Arietta after that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2806
STRING: It was going to be a cruel letter, one that she'd never
hope for.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2812
STRING: What I think is right.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x281e
STRING: Right this second, that would be giving Lise the chance
to laugh.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2834
STRING: It wasn't the start of a breakup.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2840
STRING: But my letter was probably going to hurt Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x284c
STRING: However, I couldn't lie to her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2858
STRING: With the last shred of honesty left in me, I had to tell
her the truth in my letter.
